Interests

In addition to my passion for cloud engineering, my interests are diverse and reflect a well-rounded approach to both professional and personal growth. Outside the realm of technology, I am an avid football (soccer) enthusiast - my favourite team being Manchester United! Beyond the pitch, I am an avid reader who appreciates delving into a variety of genres including self help books, and my penchant for researching new technical documentation attests to my commitment to staying up to date with the latest trends in cloud technology.

Intrigued by the intersection of technology and business, I enjoy researching the latest trends in both domains. My fascination with Artificial Intelligence extends beyond professional pursuits, as I actively explore its applications and advancements. Lastly, I love travelling (would love to travel more!) and my curiosity for understanding different cultures and perspectives, contribute to my holistic approach to problem-solving and adaptability in my professional endeavors. Thank you for taking the time out to visit my page today!
